name: Warrior's Certificate
description: A certificate that allows you to learn the Warrior job. Grants mastery of physical combat and melee weapons.

name: Mage's Certificate
description: A certificate that allows you to learn the Mage job. Grants mastery of arcane magic and elemental spells.

name: Healer's Certificate
description: A certificate that allows you to learn the Healer job. Grants mastery of divine magic and restoration spells.

name: Thief's Certificate
description: A certificate that allows you to learn the Thief job. Grants mastery of stealth, speed, and thievery.

name: Blacksmith's Certificate
description: A certificate that allows you to learn the Blacksmith job. Grants mastery of weapon and armor crafting. Requires Warrior job.

name: Merchant's Certificate
description: A certificate that allows you to learn the Merchant job. Grants mastery of trade, commerce, and shop management. Requires Thief job.
